name: Baby (Atari 2600 game)
description:
REQUIRES ATARI 2600 EMULATOR TO PLAY

You can find an in browser emulator at:

https://javatari.org

Or you can download Stella (recommended) at:

https://stella-emu.github.io

STORY

In the not so distant future aliens attack a game development studio and now there's a war between the Game Devs and the Aliens. The gun fighting leaves the two sides in a constant stalemate. You play as Baby, the studio's dog, and you have the only ability that gives the humans the edge: Baby's cuteness. These aliens are completely averse to extreme levels of cuteness.

GAMEPLAY

Avoid bullets from both sides

Avoid the thing in the middle screen

Touch the human to get pet (this gives you bonus points)

You move with the joystick

Holding the fire button or switching your system to difficulty 1 to B will pause the game. Releasing the fire button or switching back to difficulty A will unpause the game. 

Hitting the selectswitch will randomize the colors.

Hitting black and white will make the game black and white. Switching back to color will not change back from black and white.

HIGH SCORES

3560 Jonathan Landis ((https://www.twitch.tv/videos/237070223)

2510 Scott Vieth  (https://www.twitch.tv/sav2880)

SPECIAL THANKS

Chris Volpe of Multivarious Games who's dog was the inspirations for this game

The Central Ohio Gamedev Group whose members helped bug test his game
